name: @algorandfoundation/tealscript
description: Enables Algorand smart contract development with native TypeScript syntax, tooling, and IDE support

scripts.simple-gen: yarn simple-gen-artifacts && yarn simple-gen-client && yarn fix
scripts.compile-tests: for f in tests/contracts/*.algo.ts; do echo $f && ts-node src/bin/tealscript.ts $f; done
scripts.generate-test-clients: contracts=(AbiTest LoopsTest); for c in ${contracts[@]}; do npx beaker-ts generate tests/contracts/$c.json tests/contracts/clients/; done
scripts.compile-itxns: tsx ./src/bin/tealscript.ts examples/itxns/itxns.algo.ts examples/itxns/artifacts && beaker generate examples/itxns/artifacts/FactoryCaller.json examples/itxns/beaker-client && tsx examples/itxns/demo.ts
scripts.run-merkle: yarn compile-merkle && beaker generate examples/merkle/artifacts/MerkleTree.json examples/merkle/artifacts && tsx examples/merkle/demo.ts
scripts.test-arc75: yarn compile-arc75 && beaker generate examples/arc75/artifacts/ARC75.json examples/arc75/ && mocha --timeout 10000 -r ts-node/register 'examples/arc75/arc75_test.ts'
scripts.compile-examples: yarn compile-amm && yarn compile-arc12 && yarn compile-arc75 && yarn compile-auction && yarn compile-itxns && yarn compile-simple && yarn compile-tuple_in_box && yarn compile-calculator && yarn compile-merkle
